personal.name: Jordan Taylor
personal.title: Marketing Manager
personal.tagline: Driving digital growth through data, creativity, and strategy

hero.name: Jordan Taylor
description: Marketing Manager with 7+ years of experience leading multi-channel campaigns, brand strategy, and client growth initiatives across digital platforms.
I've helped brands and agencies create measurable impact through data-driven storytelling, paid media optimization, and integrated marketing strategies that align creativity with business goals.

about.pageTagline: Marketing Manager helping agencies and brands grow through smart strategy and creative execution

sections.title: Who I Am
content: I'm Jordan Taylor, a digital marketing professional passionate about connecting people with brands through meaningful campaigns. Over the past seven years, I've led cross-functional teams, managed client accounts, and executed performance marketing strategies that drive engagement and ROI.
I enjoy translating data into stories that resonate, helping clients understand their audiences, and creating campaigns that turn attention into action.

sections.title: What I Do
sections.intro: I design and execute digital marketing strategies with a focus on:
list: SEO, PPC, and social media marketing
Team leadership and client relationship management

sections.title: My Approach
content: I see marketing as the balance between creativity and analytics. Every campaign should tell a story while being guided by clear objectives and measurable outcomes.
I focus on collaboration, testing, and refinement — aligning strategy, content, and performance data to continuously improve results for clients and brands.

items.title: Marketing Manager
items.description: Led digital campaigns for multiple clients, managing strategy, creative, and analytics. Improved conversion rates and ROI through performance-driven initiatives across paid and organic channels.

items.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
items.description: Planned and executed SEO, SEM, and social media strategies. Developed data-led reporting frameworks to optimize campaigns and enhance client transparency.

currentFocus.title: Current Focus
currentFocus.intro: Collaborating with digital marketing agencies and brands to drive measurable growth through:
list: Performance marketing and paid media strategy

projects.pageTagline: Selected campaigns and projects demonstrating strategy, creativity, and results.

blog.pageTagline: Thoughts on marketing, creativity, and digital growth.

contact.pageTagline: Whether you need help with campaign strategy, brand positioning, or digital optimization — I'd love to connect.

methods.title: Email
methods.description: For project inquiries and collaboration requests

infoCards.title: Schedule a Meeting
infoCards.description: Book a call to discuss your marketing strategy, campaign planning, or collaboration opportunities.

aboutPreview.intro: I help agencies and brands connect strategy with creativity — building campaigns that convert attention into measurable growth.
paragraphs: With a background in digital strategy and brand management, I specialize in creating campaigns that blend data, storytelling, and design. My goal is to make marketing both meaningful and measurable.
From SEO and social media to paid media and analytics, I approach every project with curiosity and collaboration. I love finding new ways to grow audiences and strengthen brand trust.

footer.builtWith: Designed for digital marketing professionals and creative agencies.

site.title: Jordan Taylor - Marketing Manager Portfolio
